price: ហើយចូរអ្នកបន្ទាបខ្លួនប្រាណរបស់អ្នកចំពោះអ្នកណា ដែលបានធ្វើតាមអ្នកអំពីបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿ។
arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ janāḥaka limani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
